entry.tran: 针孔似的一点；极小的一丝
entry.def: A very small spot of something can be described as a pinprick .

example.ex: She looked up at me with pinpricks of sweat along her hairline.
example.tran: 她抬头看了我一眼，发际渗出细密的汗珠。

means.word_mean: 2. small puncture (as if made by a pin)
